title: Located in the heart of Sunnyvale, this Duplex features a 3bed/2 bath
posting_body: An investors' special with great income potential!!
Located in the heart of Sunnyvale, this Duplex features a 3bed/2 bath main home and a completely remodeled 2bed/1bath ADU.
Both units feature new paint, hardwood flooring, throughout, a nicely landscaped front yard.
The main house features a large kitchen with partial new cabinets and countertops, new sink, sink disposer, and a dishwasher.
A huge potential for investors to finish the huge basement for additional rent.
The ADU features 2beds/1 bath, kitchen and living room with new paint, new laminate flooring, new lighting fixtures, new doors and new baseboards.
kitchen with new dishwasher, sink with disposer, hood, new cabinets and countertops, remodeled bathroom and a new roof.
The Front yard is tastefully landscaped.
Located close to Hi-tech companies, shopping, trendy restaurants and bars, Caltrain station, freeways, SJ Airport, golf course and a lot more.
